name: Swords & Stamps
description:
Feel the power of being the most badass postman in the world of five towns and dozens of thieves!

You are a young postman in medieval age who is dreaming about becoming an employee of the month, so you have to deliver the packages as fast as you can.

But you cant! Because you are too weak!

Fight thieves who want to steal your package xd. Gain experience points. Level up your ass and become the most powerful postman that has ever world seen!
